eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male and female patients, ages 6 to 14 years, with persistent asthma that is also active during allergy season
* Patients must demonstrate positive skin prick tests to seasonally relevant geographic aeroallergens

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patient cannot have any other acute or chronic pulmonary disorder

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1) at Week 3
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change from baseline in FEV1, a measure of airway function, at Week 3

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in Mean Daily "as Needed" β-agonist Use Over the 3-week Treatment Period
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change from baseline in average daily β-agonist use over the 3-week treatment period
